text: Sir Dawda Kairaba Jawara, GCMG (May 16, 1924 - August 27, 2019) was an Gambian politician. He was the first leader of the Gambia, serving first as Prime Minister from 1962 to 1970. Then, he served as President from 1970 to 1994. Jawara died on August 27, 2019 in Bakau, The Gambia at the age of 95.The Gambia's first president, Dawda Jwara, dies aged 95 - Presidency ==References== ==Other websites== *More stories of ex-Gambian president's legacy Category:1924 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Muslims Category:Presidents of the Gambia Category:Prime ministers
title: Dawda Jawara
